column4: hello, I have a few .c files I wish to print. is there some nice program out there that will let me print them all into the same file ?
you can cat them all together to a new file, then use a2ps on that
just do something like `cat *.h *.c > printme && a2ps printme`
that works but I need to know file names as well in that file, Dr_willis, will look at that, thnx :)
